price: 47. Mpe bato ya Indjil, bakata makambo na maye Allah akitisaki o kati na yango. Mpe baye bakokata makambo na maye Allah akitisaki te bango nde babebisi.
arabic: وَلۡيَحۡكُمۡ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلِ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِۚ وَمَن لَّمۡ يَحۡكُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walyaḥkum ahlu al-injīli bimā anzala al-lahu fīhi waman lam yaḥkum bimā anzala al-lahu fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
